title: Unit 6 Lesson 3: Pebble in Pond Wave Equation
description: This module will focus on adding OpenMP to working Message Passing Interface (MPI) codes to accelerate a time dependent partial differential equation (PDE) scientific application. The module introduces an existing multi-processor parallel computing paradigm using message passing. Our goal is to reduce runtime for the PDE solver using OpenMP. The acoustic wave equation is computed for a two-dimensional domain. The time dependent partial differential equation is solved, and a file written to generate a visual animation. The program results are presented in a grey scale ImageMagik movie loop.
